item.text: David consulted with his military officers, including those who led groups of a thousand and those who led groups of a hundred.

David said to the whole Israelite assembly, “If you so desire and the Lord our God approves, let’s spread the word to our brothers who remain in all the regions of Israel, and to the priests and Levites in their cities, so they may join us.

Let’s <st data-num="05437" class="">move</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of our <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">back</st> here,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> we did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">seek</st> his will<n id="2" /> throughout <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul’s</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">reign</st>.”<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="06951" class="">assembly</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">agreed</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">this</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">proposal</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">seemed</st> <st data-num="03474" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.<n id="2" />

So <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="06950" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="07883" class="">Shihor</st> River<n id="1" /> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">Lebo</st> <st data-num="02574" class="">Hamath</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> from <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st>.
David and all Israel went up to Baalah (that is, Kiriath Jearim) in Judah to bring up from there the ark of God the Lord, who sits enthroned between the cherubim—the ark that is called by his Name.
They transported the ark of God on a new cart from the house of Abinadab; Uzzah and Ahio were guiding the cart,

while <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> were <st data-num="03605 05797">energetically</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07832" class="">celebrating</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="07892" class="">singing</st> and playing <st data-num="03658 05035">various stringed instruments</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08596" class="">tambourines</st>, <st data-num="04700" class="">cymbals</st>, and <st data-num="02689" class="">trumpets</st>.

When they <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="01637" class="">threshing floor</st> of <st data-num="03592" class="">Kidon</st>, <st data-num="05798" class="">Uzzah</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">reached out</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> to <st data-num="0270" class="">take hold of</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="01241" class="">oxen</st> <st data-num="08058" class="">stumbled</st>.
The Lord was so furious with Uzzah, he killed him, because he reached out his hand and touched the ark. He died right there before God.
David was angry because the Lord attacked Uzzah; so he called that place Perez Uzzah, which remains its name to this very day.

<st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">was afraid of</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01963" class="">How</st> will I ever be able to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">up</st> here?”

So <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">move</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="0413 0413">to</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">City</st> of <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st>;<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="05186" class="">left</st> it <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="05654" class="">Obed-Edom</st> the <st data-num="01663" class="">Gittite</st>.
The ark of God remained in Obed-Edom’s house for three months; the Lord blessed Obed-Edom’s family and everything that belonged to him.
